home.title: Stampeo - Loyalty cards your customers actually keep
home.description: Digital loyalty cards for Apple Wallet and Google Wallet. No app to download, no card to lose. Create your free loyalty card in minutes.
home.keywords: loyalty cards, digital loyalty, Apple Wallet, Google Wallet, customer rewards, stamp cards

onboarding.title: Get Started - Stampeo
onboarding.description: Set up your digital loyalty card in minutes

contact.title: Contact - Stampeo
contact.description: Get in touch with the Stampeo team. Questions about our digital loyalty cards? We're here to help.

design-de-carte.title: Loyalty Card Design - Stampeo
design-de-carte.description: Create your digital loyalty card in 5 minutes. Customize colors, logo and design, or let us handle it.

scanner-mobile.title: Mobile Scanner - Stampeo
scanner-mobile.description: Stamp your customers in one second with your phone. Dedicated app or web scanner, with offline mode.

notifications-push.title: Push Notifications - Stampeo
notifications-push.description: Engage your customers directly on their lock screen. 85% read rate via wallet notifications.

analytiques.title: Analytics Dashboard - Stampeo
analytiques.description: Know your regulars with real data. Trends, peak hours, visit frequency and retention.

geolocalisation.title: Geolocation & Geofencing - Stampeo
geolocalisation.description: Remind your customers you exist when they pass nearby. Native Apple Wallet geofencing, GDPR compliant.

programme-fondateur.title: Founding Partner Program - Stampeo
programme-fondateur.description: 3 months free, €14.99/month for life, all Pro features. Join the first 50 partner businesses.

acquisition.notFoundDesc: This business could not be found.
acquisition.title: Get your {businessName} loyalty card | Stampeo
acquisition.defaultDesc: Join {businessName}'s loyalty program and earn rewards with every visit.
